    public static class Advice.OffsetMapping.ForStackManipulation.Factory<T extends Annotation>
extends Object
implements Advice.OffsetMapping.Factory<T>
    A factory that binds a stack manipulation.

               StackManipulation stackManipulation,
               TypeDescription.Generic typeDescription)
        Creates a new factory for binding a stack manipulation.
        参数:
        annotationType - The annotation type.
        stackManipulation - The stack manipulation that loads the bound value.
        typeDescription - The type of the loaded value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        public static <S extends Annotation> Advice.OffsetMapping.Factory<S> of(Class<S> annotationType,
                                                                        Object value)
        Creates a binding for a fixed String or primitive value.
        类型参数:
        S - The annotation type.
        参数:
        annotationType - The annotation type.
        value - The primitive (wrapper) value or String value to bind.
        返回:
        A factory for creating an offset mapping that binds the supplied value.

      • make

        public Advice.OffsetMapping make(ParameterDescription.InDefinedShape target,
                                 AnnotationDescription.Loadable<T> annotation,
                                 Advice.OffsetMapping.Factory.AdviceType adviceType)
        从接口复制的说明: Advice.OffsetMapping.Factory
        Creates a new offset mapping for the supplied parameter if possible.
        指定者:
        make 在接口中 Advice.OffsetMapping.Factory<T extends Annotation>
        参数:
        target - The parameter description for which to resolve an offset mapping.
        annotation - The annotation that triggered this factory.
        adviceType - true if the binding is applied using advice method delegation.
        返回:
        A resolved offset mapping or null if no mapping can be resolved for this parameter.
